ComicInfo.Series: The Official Handbook of the Invincible Universe
ComicInfo.Summary: Anything you've ever wanted to know about the characters in INVINCIBLE but were afraid to ask. Power levels, hometowns, relatives, origins, shoe sizes... it's all here. Written in the tradition of that other famous handbook and featuring drawings from some of the top talents in comics and animation. A MUST HAVE FOR ANY INVINCIBLE FAN!Official Invincible Handbook containing profiles on characters listed from Kursk to Winslow, B.N.
ComicInfo.Title: K-W - Kursk to Winslow, B.N.
